description: Amendments to planning permission dated 11th December 2024 (RN: 24/04081/FULL) for, 'Change of use of part-basement, part-ground floor and part-first floor to provide two food hall premises (Sui Generis). Alterations and extensions at roof level, including the creation of a roof terrace, green roof, and replacement of plant; replacement of windows throughout the building, alterations to the ground floor facades, creation of a new terrace at second floor level on Air Street and creation of new cycle facilities'; Namely, to amend the description of development to read as follows: 'Change of use of part-basement, part-ground floor and part-first floor to provide a food hall premises (Sui Generis). Alterations and extensions at roof level, including the creation of a roof terrace, green roof, and replacement of plant; replacement of windows throughout the building, alterations to the ground floor facades, creation of a new terrace at second floor level on Air Street and creation of new cycle facilities' (Removing reference to 'two' food hall premises)
